variants.Description in input context: This variant was identified in a study investigating the role of TP53BP1 in DNA damage response and repair.

Material used.Material Source: Cell lines and patient-derived tissue samples
Material used.Material Name: HeLa cells, MCF7 cells, primary breast cancer cells

Readout description.Result Description: Reduced expression of TP53BP1 protein was observed for the variant NM_004769.5:c.1129C>T (p.Pro377Leu).

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were performed for each experiment.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type TP53BP1 cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector or no template control was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA and Student's t-test were used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: TP53BP1 protein expression greater than 80% relative to wild-type TP53BP1.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: TP53BP1 protein expression less than 60% relative to wild-type TP53BP1.
